title: Validation report for cdif.bbr.metadata.profiles.cdifProfiles.CDIFDataDescription - CDIF discovery and data description metadata
bblockName: CDIF discovery and data description metadata

entries.message: Test was expected to fail and it did.
Using affiliation-fail.json from test resources
JSON-LD context is present - uplifting
Output JSON-LD affiliation-fail.jsonld created
Output Turtle affiliation-fail.ttl created

ValidationError: 'schema:name' is a required property

    {'required': ['@id',
                  '@type',
                  '@context',
                  'schema:name',
                  'schema:identifier',
                  'schema:dateModified',
                  'schema:subjectOf']}
